title: Bad Rats
notes: Hangs after a few seconds at the main menu (Note from another contributor: Unlike Windows, Linux will not put up with such a thing)

title: Bad Rats
notes: Needs PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 (without it, crashes after a few seconds in the main menu)

title: Bad Rats
notes: Crashes after a short time in game or at the menu

title: Bad Rats
notes: By default was crashing when you start a game. Works perfectly with  "PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%" added in Bad Rats - Properties > SET LAUNCH OPTIONS...
Runs out of the box with no problems.
title: Bad Rats: the Rats' Revenge

cpu: AMD A8-9600 RADEON R7, 10 COMPUTE CORES 4C+6G
notes: i dont know if it's the game or steamplay but, it runs at like, 5 frames per second.
title: Bad Rats: the Rats' Revenge
